page.title: 20CONCLUSIONS
page.content: The 12sq km area allocated,proved to be full of interest which went well beyond the initial expectations. The depth of researching and reporting required support from the teaching staff especially for the younger pupils but nevertheless,with limited guidance,all the pupils found the project great fun. The overall view of both pupils and staff was that the project was very worthwhile,everybody learning in great detail about the industries,the trades,the farming methods,distilling and working and living standards of the people in the immediate area of the school.
